text: The ABS-CBN Broadcasting Center (also called ABS-CBN Broadcast Center; formerly known as Broadcast Plaza from 1974 to 1979 and current edifice formerly spelled officially as ABS-CBN Broadcasting Centre) in Diliman, Quezon City, Philippines was the oldest headquarters of ABS-CBN. Category:1960s establishments in the Philippines Category:1968 establishments in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in the Philippines
title: ABS-CBN Broadcasting Center
